name: eBird Dark
description: A dark theme designed for ebird.org
additional_info: This theme is hosted on GitHub, please report any bugs there:  https://github.com/overdodactyl/eBird-Dark
css:
/*! Copyright (c) 2018 overdodactyl
    License:    https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/
    https://github.com/overdodactyl/eBird-Dark

    Desing inspiration and color scheme (including background pattern) come from
    GitHub-Dark: https://github.com/StylishThemes/GitHub-Dark
    License:    https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/
*/
@-moz-document domain(ebird.org) {
  * {
    border-color: #444!important;
    text-shadow: none!important;
    box-shadow: none!important
  }
  a {
    color: #4183c4!important
  }
  a:hover {
    background-color: #242424!important
  }
  body {
    background: url(data:image/png;base64,) left top #191919!important;
    color: silver!important
  }
  .Header--ebird,
  .pagebar > .inner > .bd {
    background: #111!important
  }
  #clone-navbar,
  .listsTabs {
    border-bottom: 1px solid #444!important
  }
  #ve #minor .highlights,
  .IllustratedChecklist .IllustratedChecklist-search,
  .IllustratedChecklist .IllustratedChecklist-statFilters,
  .Panel--simpleWhite,
  .SpeciesRecord,
  .bbar-btn,
  .bbar-btn:hover,
  .bbar-dis,
  .bbar-dis:active,
  .bbar-dis:hover,
  .btn-addFs,
  .btn-addFs:hover,
  .btn-change,
  .btn-close,
  .btn-close--subpanel,
  .btn-close-kb,
  .btn-close-tip,
  .btn-minor,
  .btn-more,
  .date-pick,
  .date-pick-range,
  .dp-trigger,
  .email-harvester__bd,
  .fields-hi,
  .form-section,
  .form-separator,
  .grid dl,
  .latlong-toggler,
  .location-chooser .ac_results .bd,
  .map-sidebar,
  .map-sub-button,
  .mod-inset,
  .opt-pick,
  .sd,
  .simplemodal-container,
  .simplemodal-data,
  .specLtblue,
  .specWhite,
  .status,
  .trow0,
  .webring a,
  .webring a:hover,
  a.bbar-btn,
  a.bbar-btn:hover,
  a.bbar-dis,
  a.bbar-dis:active,
  a.bbar-dis:hover,
  a.btn-addFs,
  a.btn-addFs:hover,
  a.btn-change,
  a.btn-close,
  a.btn-close--subpanel,
  a.btn-close-kb,
  a.btn-close-tip,
  a.btn-det-a,
  a.btn-det-h,
  a.btn-minor,
  a.btn-more,
  a.dp-trigger,
  a.latlong-toggler,
  a.map-sub-button,
  table {
    background: #181818!important
  }
  .form-section .controlInstructions {
    background: #242424!important
  }
  .grid dl {
    border-radius: 10px!important;
    margin-left: 4px!important;
    margin-top: 4px!important;
    border: 1px solid #444!important
  }
  .Callout {
    border-radius: 10px!important;
    margin-left: 4px!important;
    border: 1px solid #444!important;
    background: #181818!important
  }
  #BCRcontrols select,
  #age,
  #areaUnit,
  #bMonth,
  #bYear,
  #countrySelect,
  #distUnit,
  #eMonth,
  #eYear,
  #myLocSel,
  #protocol-other,
  #rbaReg,
  #stateSelect,
  #visReg,
  .IllustratedChecklist .IllChk-speciesJump-searchBox input,
  .algolia-autocomplete .aa-input,
  .as .subscription-tools,
  .as .subscription-tools .remove,
  .as-count,
  .comments,
  .dd-rich,
  .input,
  .input--massivetext,
  .input--massivetext.empty,
  .input--massivetext:focus,
  .input-num,
  .input-search-main,
  .map-btn-minor,
  .map-loc-search,
  .map-search,
  .sc,
  .sel-day,
  .sel-month,
  .sel-year,
  .spp-comments,
  .spp-input,
  .textarea,
  .textinput,
  .textinput-sm,
  .ti-enter-spp,
  .ti-enter-spp-es,
  .ti-enter-spp-fr,
  .ti-jumpto,
  .ti-jumpto-es,
  .ti-jumpto-fr,
  .ti-search,
  [data-whatinput=mouse] .Button,
  add-search,
  select,
  select.long {
    background-color: #181818!important;
    border: 1px solid #444!important;
    color: silver!important
  }
  #main .XleftNavMyEbird .leftNavMyEbird-profileTeaser,
  .s-sub-section {
    background: #181818!important;
    border: 1px solid #444!important;
    border-radius: 4px!important
  }
  .add-search,
  .map-loc-search,
  .map-search,
  .ti-enter-spp,
  .ti-enter-spp-es,
  .ti-enter-spp-fr,
  .ti-jumpto,
  .ti-jumpto-es,
  .ti-jumpto-fr,
  .ti-search {
    border: 1px solid #444!important;
    background-color: #181818!important
  }
  .am #my_alerts table,
  .am table.alert-grid {
    border: 1px solid #444!important
  }
  .BarChart tbody tr td,
  .SpeciesRecord .SpeciesRecord-mediaNeeded .MissingContent,
  .am table.alert-grid tr:hover td,
  .location-chooser .ac_results .ac_over {
    background-color: #242424!important
  }
  .as-answer .selected {
    background-color: #242424!important;
    color: silver!important
  }
  .as #sightingsTable tr.obs-details-toggler td a {
    background: #242424!important
  }
  .BarChart thead tr th {
    background-color: #242424!important;
    color: silver!important
  }
  .BarChart tbody tr td.needData {
    background: repeating-linear-gradient(45deg,#242424,#242424 2px,#111 2px,#111 4px)!important
  }
  .header-logos a {
    display: none!important
  }
  #ebird-header,
  #ebird-header-mask.tall,
  #ebird-header-mask.tall #header-logos,
  #ebird-header-mask.tall #portal-logo a {
    height: 20px!important;
    background: 0 0!important
  }
  #main,
  .fixed-width,
  .footer-module,
  .main__section,
  .tb-tabcontrol--screen-head .tab-disabled,
  .tb-tabcontrol--screen-head a {
    border: none!important
  }
  #clone-navbar,
  #clone-navbar a,
  #clone-navbar li,
  #ebird-personalbar,
  #main,
  #portal-columns .fixed-width,
  #region-content,
  #search-results .clearfix,
  #welcome-box,
  .Panel--ebirdBackground,
  .Search-wrap,
  .Tabs--nav ul[role=tablist] li a,
  .Vnarrow #content,
  .am #all_alerts,
  .am #all_alerts form,
  .body,
  .body-2col,
  .checklist-note,
  .cl-form,
  .content-section,
  .fb-toolbar,
  .form-base,
  .gmap-base,
  .listsTabs,
  .listsTabs a,
  .listsTabs li,
  .main,
  .narrow #content,
  .screen-foot > .inner,
  .search-tabs .inner,
  .secondary,
  .tb-tabcontrol--screen-head,
  .wide #content,
  html {
    background: 0 0!important
  }
  .secondary {
    border: none!important
  }
  .SearchBox .SearchBox-button {
    background: #242424!important;
    color: silver!important;
    border: 1px solid #444!important;
    height: 42px
  }
  input-group-button {
    background: #444!important
  }
  .algolia-autocomplete,
  .table td.num--row,
  .table th {
    background: #242424!important;
    color: silver!important
  }
  #clone-navbar a,
  #main,
  .Button,
  .Header--ebird .Header-navMenu li a,
  .IllustratedChecklist .IllChk-speciesJump-label label,
  .RadioGroup--fauxSelect .RadioGroup-toggler.RadioGroup-toggler--button,
  .Tabs--nav ul[role=tablist] li a,
  .ac_results li,
  .as-text--minor,
  .btn-action,
  .fixed-width,
  .footer-module,
  .linkbar--pills a,
  .listsTabs a,
  .main__section,
  .ms-input,
  .pagebar a,
  .sidebar-head,
  .table thead > tr > th a,
  .tb-tabcontrol--screen-head .tab-disabled,
  .tb-tabcontrol--screen-head a,
  a.btn-change,
  a.btn-det-a,
  a.btn-det-h,
  h1,
  h2,
  p.currentDate,
  p.currentLocation,
  table.barChart th p,
  table.barChart th.sC,
  table.barChart tr.rC td.sC,
  table.decisionMap th p,
  th span.species {
    color: silver!important
  }
  .Button--goToTop,
  .Button--goToTop:active,
  .Button--goToTop:focus,
  .Button--goToTop:hover,
  input[type=button],
  input[type=reset],
  input[type=submit] {
    background: linear-gradient(#303030,#282828)!important;
    border: 1px solid #484848!important;
    color: silver!important;
    border-radius: 3px!important
  }
  .btn-action,
  .btn-continue,
  .btn-input,
  .btn-normal,
  .btn-results-add,
  .se-ind-conf {
    background: linear-gradient(#508055,#407045)!important
  }
  .search-panel {
    background: #444!important
  }
  #clone-navbar li.current-menu-item a,
  #clone-navbar li.selected a,
  .Header--ebird a.is-active,
  .Tabs ul[role=tablist] li a[aria-selected=true],
  .listsTabs #on a,
  .tb-tabcontrol--screen-head .active a {
    color: #4183c4!important;
    background: #222!important;
    border-top: 1px solid #444!important;
    border-left: 1px solid #444!important;
    border-right: 1px solid #444!important
  }
  #portal-columns .fixed-width {
    margin-top: 15px!important
  }
  table {
    border: 1px solid #444!important
  }
  html.js.rgba.hsla.multiplebgs.backgroundsize.borderradius.boxshadow.opacity.cssgradients.generatedcontent.video.audio.localstorage.svg.cssfilters.grunticon body.hotspot-profile.ebird div.page div.body.line div.size1of3 div#recentChecklists.secondary__section table.table.table-clean.table-hover tbody tr td.num,
  html.js.rgba.hsla.multiplebgs.backgroundsize.borderradius.boxshadow.opacity.cssgradients.generatedcontent.video.audio.localstorage.svg.cssfilters.grunticon body.hotspot-profile.ebird div.page div.body.line div.size1of3 div#top100.secondary__section div.line table#top-ebirders.table.table-clean tbody tr td.top-total,
  table td.row-actions {
    padding-right: 4px!important
  }
  html.js.rgba.hsla.multiplebgs.backgroundsize.borderradius.boxshadow.opacity.cssgradients.generatedcontent.video.audio.localstorage.svg.cssfilters.grunticon body.hotspot-profile.ebird div.page div.body.line div.size1of3 div#recentChecklists.secondary__section table.table.table-clean.table-hover tbody tr td.observer {
    padding-left: 4px!important
  }
  .table-clean > tbody > tr:hover > td {
    background-color: #242424!important
  }
  .bbar-btn:hover,
  .bbar-dis:hover,
  .btn-addFs:hover,
  .btn-change:hover,
  .btn-close--subpanel:hover,
  .btn-close-kb:hover,
  .btn-close-tip:hover,
  .btn-close:hover,
  .btn-minor:hover,
  .btn-more:hover,
  .dp-trigger:hover,
  .latlong-toggler:hover,
  .linkbar--pills a:hover,
  .map-sub-button:hover,
  .webring a:hover,
  a.bbar-btn:hover,
  a.bbar-dis:hover,
  a.btn-addFs:hover,
  a.btn-change:hover,
  a.btn-close--subpanel:hover,
  a.btn-close-kb:hover,
  a.btn-close-tip:hover,
  a.btn-close:hover,
  a.btn-det-a:hover,
  a.btn-det-h:hover,
  a.btn-minor:hover,
  a.btn-more:hover,
  a.dp-trigger:hover,
  a.latlong-toggler:hover,
  a.map-sub-button:hover,
  div.bbar-btn:hover,
  div.bbar-dis:hover,
  div.btn-addFs:hover,
  div.btn-change:hover,
  div.btn-close--subpanel:hover,
  div.btn-close-kb:hover,
  div.btn-close-tip:hover,
  div.btn-close:hover,
  div.btn-minor:hover,
  div.btn-more:hover,
  div.dp-trigger:hover,
  div.latlong-toggler:hover,
  div.map-sub-button:hover {
    background: #242424!important
  }
  .ac_match,
  .location-chooser .ac_results .ac_match,
  Header--ebird a.is-active {
    color: #4183c4!important
  }
  .ac_over,
  .dropzone {
    background: #242424!important
  }
  .hero__title {
    color: #111!important
  }
  .errors .inner {
    background-color: #b22323!important
  }
  .message .inner {
    background: #4ba600!important
  }
  .link-top,
  .tb-add,
  .tb-kb,
  .tb-prefs,
  .tb-sort,
  a.link-top {
    filter: invert(65%)!important
  }
  .ac_results .bd,
  .ac_results .bd a,
  .dd-list,
  .dd-list a {
    background: #181818!important;
    color: silver!important
  }
  .bbar-btn,
  .bbar-btn:hover,
  .bbar-dis,
  .bbar-dis:active,
  .bbar-dis:hover,
  .btn-addFs,
  .btn-addFs:hover,
  .btn-change,
  .btn-close,
  .btn-close--subpanel,
  .btn-close-kb,
  .btn-close-tip,
  .btn-minor,
  .btn-more,
  .dp-trigger,
  .latlong-toggler,
  .map-sub-button,
  .webring a,
  .webring a:hover,
  a.bbar-btn,
  a.bbar-btn:hover,
  a.bbar-dis,
  a.bbar-dis:active,
  a.bbar-dis:hover,
  a.btn-addFs,
  a.btn-addFs:hover,
  a.btn-change,
  a.btn-close,
  a.btn-close--subpanel,
  a.btn-close-kb,
  a.btn-close-tip,
  a.btn-det-a,
  a.btn-det-h,
  a.btn-minor,
  a.btn-more,
  a.dp-trigger,
  a.latlong-toggler,
  a.map-sub-button {
    color: silver!important
  }
  .listsTable,
  .statsTable {
    border-radius: 3px!important
  }
  .listsTable th,
  .statsTable th {
    background: #242424!important
  }
  table.barChart tr.row1,
  table.barChart tr.row2 {
    background-color: #181818!important
  }
  table.barChart tr.rC td {
    border-color: #444!important
  }
  .barChart th.mTC,
  .controlInstructions p {
    background: #242424!important
  }
  .dd-panel,
  .gm-style .gm-style-iw,
  div.goog-info-window div.popup--hotspot h5.pop-data__date-range,
  div.goog-info-window--zoom h5.pop-data__date-range {
    background: #181818!important
  }
  #Chart-innerRect,
  #Histogram-innerRect {
    filter: invert(100%)!important
  }
  #Chart-abun .Chart,
  #Chart-ac .Chart,
  #Chart-bph .Chart,
  #Chart-hc .Chart,
  #Chart-totals .Chart,
  .Histogram-barChart,
  html body div#Wrapper div#main div#contentwrapper.wide div#content div#charts.Chart-lineChart div.Tabs.Tabs--general section#freq div#Chart-freq.Chart-lineChart svg.Chart {
    background: #000!important;
    border: 1px solid #444!important;
    border-radius: 3px!important
  }
  .Chart-axis line,
  .Chart-axis text,
  .Chart-legend,
  .Histogram-label,
  .domain,
  .tick {
    filter: invert(65%)!important
  }
  .Tabs--general ul[role=tablist] li [role=tab],
  .Tabs--general ul[role=tablist] li a,
  table.barChart {
    background: 0 0!important;
    border: none!important
  }
  .bbar-btn span,
  .bbar-btn:hover span,
  .bbar-dis span,
  .bbar-dis:active span,
  .bbar-dis:hover span,
  .btn-action span,
  .btn-action--dark span,
  .btn-addFs span,
  .btn-addFs:hover span,
  .btn-back span,
  .btn-change span,
  .btn-close span,
  .btn-close--subpanel span,
  .btn-close-kb span,
  .btn-close-tip span,
  .btn-continue span,
  .btn-input span,
  .btn-minor span,
  .btn-more span,
  .btn-results-add span,
  .button span,
  .dp-trigger span,
  .fileupload .file-name,
  .latlong-toggler span,
  .map-sub-button span,
  .se-ind-conf span,
  .tb-hint span,
  .webring a span,
  .webring a:hover span,
  a.btn-det-a span,
  a.btn-det-h span {
    color: silver!important
  }
  li.selected {
    background: #181818!important
  }
  .MediaList .inner,
  .template-upload__details .bd {
    background: #242424!important
  }
}
@-moz-document url-prefix(https://secure.birds.cornell.edu) {
  body {
    background: url(data:image/png;base64,) left top #191919!important;
    color: silver!important
  }
  .Page {
    background: 0 0
  }
  .HeaderFlex-list .HeaderFlex-link,
  .InputPassword-field,
  .InputText-field,
  .Panel--muted {
    background: #181818!important;
    border: 1px solid #444!important;
    border-radius: 4px!important;
    color: silver!important
  }
  .HeaderFlex-link:focus,
  .HeaderFlex-link:hover {
    background: #242424!important
  }
  [type=color]:focus,
  [type=date]:focus,
  [type=datetime-local]:focus,
  [type=datetime]:focus,
  [type=email]:focus,
  [type=month]:focus,
  [type=number]:focus,
  [type=password]:focus,
  [type=search]:focus,
  [type=tel]:focus,
  [type=text]:focus,
  [type=time]:focus,
  [type=url]:focus,
  [type=week]:focus,
  textarea:focus {
    box-shadow: 0 0 5px #4183c4!important
  }
  .HeaderFlex-list .HeaderFlex-link {
    border-bottom: 1px solid #181818
  }
  label {
    color: silver!important
  }
}
